title: Has your family been affected by the Brazilian or South African variants of Covid-19?
summary:
Last month, a total of 170 cases of the South African coronavirus variant were uncovered in the UK by Public Health England, which were mostly linked to international travel.
We are looking to speak with families who who have been impacted by the Brazilian or South African variants of Covid 19.
Please get in touch if you would like to share your contact details in confidence with the reporters on this project.
Your responses are secure as the form is encrypted and only the Guardian has access to your contributions.
One of our journalists will be in contact before we publish, so please do leave contact details.
paragraphs: Last month, a total of 170 cases of the South African coronavirus variant were uncovered in the UK by Public Health England, which were mostly linked to international travel.
We are looking to speak with families who who have been impacted by the Brazilian or South African variants of Covid 19. Have you lost a loved one to one of the new variants?
Please get in touch if you would like to share your contact details in confidence with the reporters on this project.

You can get in touch by filling in the form below, anonymously if you wish or via WhatsApp by clicking here or adding the contact +44(0)7867825056. Your responses are secure as the form is encrypted and only the Guardian has access to your contributions.
One of our journalists will be in contact before we publish, so please do leave contact details.
If you’re having trouble using the form, click here. Read terms of service here.
